item.title: Deploy a Hugo website using Github Actions on Github Pages - Part 1
item.description: In this Series Part 1: Setup Github repo to deploy Hugo website to Github Pages Part 2: Using Github Actions to Deploy a Hugo Website to Github Pages Introduction In the first part of this guide, I’m going to explain how I’m deploying this website to Github Pages with couple of git commit (and followed by git push of course). I’ll link to the other guides I used for reference as we go along the process.
